document.full_text: intel's chief executive rejected speculation the world's largest chipmaker might adopt rival arm holdings' technology to build mobile chips and said smartphones using its silicon are about a year away.
document.title: intel chief says doesn't need arm for mobile chips
lines_and_colors: intel's chief executive rejected speculation the world's largest chipmaker might adopt rival arm holdings' technology to build mobile chips and said smartphones using its silicon are about a year away.
